<script>
        (function () {
            var errors = [];

            function send() {
                if (errors.length === 0) { return; }
                var request = window.XMLHttpRequest;
                try {
                    var xhr = new request();
                    var logurl = "/on/demandware.store/Sites-dsquared2-row-Site/en_US/Error-JsLogger";
                    var params = JSON.stringify(errors);
                    errors = [];

                    xhr.open("POST", logurl, true);
                    xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
                    xhr.setRequestHeader("x-requested-with", "XMLHttpRequest");
                    xhr.timeout = 5000;
                    xhr.send(params);
                } catch (e) {}
            }

            function getDebounceSend() {
                var timer = null;
                return function() {
                    if (timer) return;
                    timer = setTimeout(function () {
                        send();
                        timer = null;
                    }, 500);
                };
            }

            var debouncedSend = getDebounceSend();

            function log(type, message, line, column, e) {
                errors.push({
                    type: type,
                    message: message,
                    url: window.location.href,
                    line: line,
                    column: column,
                    stack: e && e.stack
                });
                debouncedSend();
            }

            window.onerror = function(message, url, line, column, e) {
                log('window.onerror', message, line, column, e);
                return false;
            };
            if (window.console) {
                var consoleError = console.error;
                console.error = function () {
                    consoleError.apply(this, arguments);
                    log('console.error', arguments[0], 'N/A', 'N/A', new Error());
                };

                var consoleWarn = console.warn;
                console.warn = function () {
                    consoleWarn.apply(this, arguments);
                    log('console.warn', arguments[0], 'N/A', 'N/A', new Error());
                };
            }
        })();
    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (head-active_data.js) */
var dw = (window.dw || {});
dw.ac = {
    _analytics: null,
    _events: [],
    _category: "",
    _searchData: "",
    _anact: "",
    _anact_nohit_tag: "",
    _analytics_enabled: "true",
    _timeZone: "Europe/Rome",
    _capture: function(configs) {
        if (Object.prototype.toString.call(configs) === "[object Array]") {
            configs.forEach(captureObject);
            return;
        }
        dw.ac._events.push(configs);
    },
	capture: function() { 
		dw.ac._capture(arguments);
		// send to CQ as well:
		if (window.CQuotient) {
			window.CQuotient.trackEventsFromAC(arguments);
		}
	},
    EV_PRD_SEARCHHIT: "searchhit",
    EV_PRD_DETAIL: "detail",
    EV_PRD_RECOMMENDATION: "recommendation",
    EV_PRD_SETPRODUCT: "setproduct",
    applyContext: function(context) {
        if (typeof context === "object" && context.hasOwnProperty("category")) {
        	dw.ac._category = context.category;
        }
        if (typeof context === "object" && context.hasOwnProperty("searchData")) {
        	dw.ac._searchData = context.searchData;
        }
    },
    setDWAnalytics: function(analytics) {
        dw.ac._analytics = analytics;
    },
    eventsIsEmpty: function() {
        return 0 == dw.ac._events.length;
    }
};
/* ]]> */

<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (head-cquotient.js) */
var CQuotient = window.CQuotient = {};
CQuotient.clientId = 'bdnr-dsquared2-row';
CQuotient.realm = 'BJTL';
CQuotient.siteId = 'dsquared2-row';
CQuotient.instanceType = 'prd';
CQuotient.locale = 'en_US';
CQuotient.fbPixelId = '__UNKNOWN__';
CQuotient.activities = [];
CQuotient.cqcid='';
CQuotient.cquid='';
CQuotient.cqeid='';
CQuotient.cqlid='';
CQuotient.apiHost='api.cquotient.com';
/* Turn this on to test against Staging Einstein */
/* CQuotient.useTest= true; */
CQuotient.useTest = ('true' === 'false');
CQuotient.initFromCookies = function () {
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
	  var c = ca[i];
	  while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
	  if (c.indexOf('cqcid=') == 0) {
		CQuotient.cqcid=c.substring('cqcid='.length,c.length);
	  } else if (c.indexOf('cquid=') == 0) {
		  var value = c.substring('cquid='.length,c.length);
		  if (value) {
		  	var split_value = value.split("|", 3);
		  	if (split_value.length > 0) {
			  CQuotient.cquid=split_value[0];
		  	}
		  	if (split_value.length > 1) {
			  CQuotient.cqeid=split_value[1];
		  	}
		  	if (split_value.length > 2) {
			  CQuotient.cqlid=split_value[2];
		  	}
		  }
	  }
	}
}
CQuotient.getCQCookieId = function () {
	if(window.CQuotient.cqcid == '')
		window.CQuotient.initFromCookies();
	return window.CQuotient.cqcid;
};
CQuotient.getCQUserId = function () {
	if(window.CQuotient.cquid == '')
		window.CQuotient.initFromCookies();
	return window.CQuotient.cquid;
};
CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail = function () {
	if(window.CQuotient.cqeid == '')
		window.CQuotient.initFromCookies();
	return window.CQuotient.cqeid;
};
CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin = function () {
	if(window.CQuotient.cqlid == '')
		window.CQuotient.initFromCookies();
	return window.CQuotient.cqlid;
};
CQuotient.trackEventsFromAC = function (/* Object or Array */ events) {
try {
	if (Object.prototype.toString.call(events) === "[object Array]") {
		events.forEach(_trackASingleCQEvent);
	} else {
		CQuotient._trackASingleCQEvent(events);
	}
} catch(err) {}
};
CQuotient._trackASingleCQEvent = function ( /* Object */ event) {
	if (event && event.id) {
		if (event.type === dw.ac.EV_PRD_DETAIL) {
			CQuotient.trackViewProduct( {id:'', alt_id: event.id, type: 'raw_sku'} );
		} // not handling the other dw.ac.* events currently
	}
};
CQuotient.trackViewProduct = function(/* Object */ cqParamData){
	var cq_params = {};
	cq_params.cookieId = CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.product = cqParamData.product;
	cq_params.realm = cqParamData.realm;
	cq_params.siteId = cqParamData.siteId;
	cq_params.instanceType = cqParamData.instanceType;
	cq_params.locale = CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(CQuotient.sendActivity) {
		CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewProduct', cq_params);
	} else {
		CQuotient.activities.push({activityType: 'viewProduct', parameters: cq_params});
	}
};
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

        }
    ];

    oggettiMultilingua.forEach(translations => {
        if (translations.lang === language) {
            //document.querySelectorAll('#freeship').forEach(el => el.innerHTML = translations.sales);
            document.querySelectorAll('#countdown-cta_men').forEach(el => el.innerHTML = translations.cta_men);
            document.querySelectorAll('#countdown-cta_women').forEach(el => el.innerHTML = translations.cta_women);
            document.querySelectorAll('#countdown-cta_kids').forEach(el => el.innerHTML = translations.cta_kids);
            document.querySelectorAll('.sales').forEach(el => el.innerHTML = translations.sales);
        }
    });

</script>

}
};

}

})();

var tcInfo = JSON.parse("\u007b\"product\u005fid\"\u003a\"PPW0110140073402137\"\u002c\"product\u005fsku\"\u003anull\u002c\"product\u005fname\"\u003a\"Gothic\u0020Dsquared2\u0020Pumps\"\u002c\"product\u005fvariant\"\u003a\"2137\"\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpage\"\u003a\"https\u003a\/\/www\u002edsquared2\u002ecom\/us\/gothic\u002ddsquared2\u002dpumps\/PPW0110140073402137\u002ehtml\"\u002c\"product\u005fdiscount\u005ftf\"\u003a\"0\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005fcurrentprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"975\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005foriginalprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"975\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005finstock\"\u003a\"1\"\u002c\"product\u005fbreadcrumb\u005flabel\"\u003a\u005b\"Home\"\u002c\"Women\"\u002c\"Shoes\"\u002c\"Pumps\"\u002c\"Gothic\u0020Dsquared2\u0020Pumps\"\u005d\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpicture\"\u003a\"\/dw\/image\/v2\/BJTL\u005fPRD\/on\/demandware\u002estatic\/\u002d\/Sites\u002ddsquared2\u002dmaster\u002dcatalog\/default\/dw017c552a\/images\/PPW0110140073402137B\u002ejpg\u003fsw\u003d476\u0026sh\u003d714\u0026sm\u003dfit\u0026q\u003d65\"\u007d");
if (window.tc_vars.list_products.length < 3.0) {
window.tc_vars.list_products.push(tcInfo);
}
window.tc_vars.list_product_id.push(tcInfo.product_id);
window.tc_vars.list_product_name.push(tcInfo.product_name);
window.tc_vars.list_product_discount_tf.push(tcInfo.product_discount_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_originalprice_tf.push(tcInfo.product_originalprice_tf);

window.tc_vars.list_product_breadcrumb_label.push(tcInfo.product_breadcrumb_label);
})();
</script>

};

}

})();

(function () {

event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"PPW011101500001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Icon\u0020Clubbing\u0020Pumps\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dpumps\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"905\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");

impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"PPW011101500001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Icon\u0020Clubbing\u0020Pumps\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dpumps\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"905\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"1062\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"PPW010818905143\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"D2\u0020Statement\u0020Soft\u0020Pumps\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dpumps\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"1035\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"9207\"\u007d");

impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';

		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-shoes-pumps", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewProduct-active_data.js) */
dw.ac._capture({id: "PPW0109358015720069", type: "searchhit"});
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

};

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"HSW022701500001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Gothic\u0020Dsquared2\u0020Sandals\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dsandals\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"845\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>

var tcInfo = JSON.parse("\u007b\"product\u005fid\"\u003a\"HSW0227140073402137\"\u002c\"product\u005fsku\"\u003anull\u002c\"product\u005fname\"\u003a\"Gothic\u0020Dsquared2\u0020Sandals\"\u002c\"product\u005fvariant\"\u003a\"2137\"\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpage\"\u003a\"https\u003a\/\/www\u002edsquared2\u002ecom\/us\/gothic\u002ddsquared2\u002dsandals\/HSW0227140073402137\u002ehtml\"\u002c\"product\u005fdiscount\u005ftf\"\u003a\"0\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005fcurrentprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"845\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005foriginalprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"845\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005finstock\"\u003a\"1\"\u002c\"product\u005fbreadcrumb\u005flabel\"\u003a\u005b\"Home\"\u002c\"Women\"\u002c\"Shoes\"\u002c\"Sandals\"\u002c\"Gothic\u0020Dsquared2\u0020Sandals\"\u005d\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpicture\"\u003a\"\/dw\/image\/v2\/BJTL\u005fPRD\/on\/demandware\u002estatic\/\u002d\/Sites\u002ddsquared2\u002dmaster\u002dcatalog\/default\/dw3b70f9cc\/images\/HSW0227140073402137B\u002ejpg\u003fsw\u003d476\u0026sh\u003d714\u0026sm\u003dfit\u0026q\u003d65\"\u007d");
if (window.tc_vars.list_products.length < 3.0) {
window.tc_vars.list_products.push(tcInfo);
}
window.tc_vars.list_product_id.push(tcInfo.product_id);
window.tc_vars.list_product_name.push(tcInfo.product_name);
window.tc_vars.list_product_discount_tf.push(tcInfo.product_discount_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_originalprice_tf.push(tcInfo.product_originalprice_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_currentprice_tf.push(tcInfo.product_currentprice_tf);

window.tc_vars.list_product_instock.push(tcInfo.product_instock);
window.tc_vars.list_product_breadcrumb_label.push(tcInfo.product_breadcrumb_label);
})();
</script>

currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"HSW022714007340\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Gothic\u0020Dsquared2\u0020Sandals\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dsandals\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"845\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2137\"\u007d");

impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}

})();

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"MHW003801500001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Gothic\u0020Dsquared2\u0020Mule\u0020Sandals\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dsandals\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"775\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

<script type="text/javascript">
(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"MHW003801500001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Gothic\u0020Dsquared2\u0020Mule\u0020Sandals\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dsandals\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"775\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"1062\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>
</section>

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"HSW022701500001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Gothic\u0020Dsquared2\u0020Sandals\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dsandals\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"845\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"4073\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"HSW022801500001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Gothic\u0020Dsquared2\u0020Sandals\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dsandals\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"905\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>

var tcInfo = JSON.parse("\u007b\"product\u005fid\"\u003a\"HSW0233015000012124\"\u002c\"product\u005fsku\"\u003anull\u002c\"product\u005fname\"\u003a\"Icon\u0020Clubbing\u0020Sandals\"\u002c\"product\u005fvariant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpage\"\u003a\"https\u003a\/\/www\u002edsquared2\u002ecom\/us\/icon\u002dclubbing\u002dsandals\/HSW0233015000012124\u002ehtml\"\u002c\"product\u005fdiscount\u005ftf\"\u003a\"0\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005fcurrentprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"880\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005foriginalprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"880\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005finstock\"\u003a\"1\"\u002c\"product\u005fbreadcrumb\u005flabel\"\u003a\u005b\"Home\"\u002c\"Women\"\u002c\"Shoes\"\u002c\"Sandals\"\u002c\"Icon\u0020Clubbing\u0020Sandals\"\u005d\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpicture\"\u003a\"\/dw\/image\/v2\/BJTL\u005fPRD\/on\/demandware\u002estatic\/\u002d\/Sites\u002ddsquared2\u002dmaster\u002dcatalog\/default\/dw89b736dd\/images\/HSW0233015000012124B\u002ejpg\u003fsw\u003d476\u0026sh\u003d714\u0026sm\u003dfit\u0026q\u003d65\"\u007d");
if (window.tc_vars.list_products.length < 3.0) {
window.tc_vars.list_products.push(tcInfo);
}
window.tc_vars.list_product_id.push(tcInfo.product_id);
window.tc_vars.list_product_name.push(tcInfo.product_name);
window.tc_vars.list_product_discount_tf.push(tcInfo.product_discount_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_originalprice_tf.push(tcInfo.product_originalprice_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_currentprice_tf.push(tcInfo.product_currentprice_tf);

window.tc_vars.list_product_instock.push(tcInfo.product_instock);
window.tc_vars.list_product_breadcrumb_label.push(tcInfo.product_breadcrumb_label);
})();
</script>

event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"HSW023301500001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Icon\u0020Clubbing\u0020Sandals\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dsandals\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"880\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");

impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"HSW023301500001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Icon\u0020Clubbing\u0020Sandals\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dsandals\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"880\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"1062\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>

(function () {

event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"HSW023510000001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Marija\u0020Sandals\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dsandals\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"975\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"7043\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

var tcInfo = JSON.parse("\u007b\"product\u005fid\"\u003a\"HSW0224001000017047\"\u002c\"product\u005fsku\"\u003anull\u002c\"product\u005fname\"\u003a\"Cage\u0020Sandals\"\u002c\"product\u005fvariant\"\u003a\"7047\"\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpage\"\u003a\"https\u003a\/\/www\u002edsquared2\u002ecom\/us\/cage\u002dsandals\/HSW0224001000017047\u002ehtml\"\u002c\"product\u005fdiscount\u005ftf\"\u003a\"0\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005fcurrentprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"1485\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005foriginalprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"1485\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005finstock\"\u003a\"1\"\u002c\"product\u005fbreadcrumb\u005flabel\"\u003a\u005b\"Home\"\u002c\"Women\"\u002c\"Shoes\"\u002c\"Cage\u0020Sandals\"\u005d\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpicture\"\u003a\"\/dw\/image\/v2\/BJTL\u005fPRD\/on\/demandware\u002estatic\/\u002d\/Sites\u002ddsquared2\u002dmaster\u002dcatalog\/default\/dwcfc60deb\/images\/HSW0224001000017047B\u002ejpg\u003fsw\u003d476\u0026sh\u003d714\u0026sm\u003dfit\u0026q\u003d65\"\u007d");
if (window.tc_vars.list_products.length < 3.0) {
window.tc_vars.list_products.push(tcInfo);
}
window.tc_vars.list_product_id.push(tcInfo.product_id);
window.tc_vars.list_product_name.push(tcInfo.product_name);
window.tc_vars.list_product_discount_tf.push(tcInfo.product_discount_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_originalprice_tf.push(tcInfo.product_originalprice_tf);

window.tc_vars.list_product_breadcrumb_label.push(tcInfo.product_breadcrumb_label);
})();
</script>

impressions: []
}
};

impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}

})();

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"HSW024401500001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Boxeur\u0020Sandals\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dsandals\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"1290\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"1062\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>

impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"ABW018912900001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Gothic\u0020Dsquared2\u0020Ankle\u0020Boots\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dboots\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"1290\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");

impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}

})();

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"ABW018912900001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Gothic\u0020Dsquared2\u0020Ankle\u0020Boots\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"1290\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"1062\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

var tcInfo = JSON.parse("\u007b\"product\u005fid\"\u003a\"BOW0079189000012124\"\u002c\"product\u005fsku\"\u003anull\u002c\"product\u005fname\"\u003a\"Gothic\u0020Dsquared2\u0020Boots\"\u002c\"product\u005fvariant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpage\"\u003a\"https\u003a\/\/www\u002edsquared2\u002ecom\/us\/gothic\u002ddsquared2\u002dboots\/BOW0079189000012124\u002ehtml\"\u002c\"product\u005fdiscount\u005ftf\"\u003a\"0\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005fcurrentprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"1290\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005foriginalprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"1290\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005finstock\"\u003a\"1\"\u002c\"product\u005fbreadcrumb\u005flabel\"\u003a\u005b\"Home\"\u002c\"Women\"\u002c\"Shoes\"\u002c\"Boots\"\u002c\"Gothic\u0020Dsquared2\u0020Boots\"\u005d\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpicture\"\u003a\"\/dw\/image\/v2\/BJTL\u005fPRD\/on\/demandware\u002estatic\/\u002d\/Sites\u002ddsquared2\u002dmaster\u002dcatalog\/default\/dw7a99b391\/images\/BOW0079189000012124B\u002ejpg\u003fsw\u003d476\u0026sh\u003d714\u0026sm\u003dfit\u0026q\u003d65\"\u007d");
if (window.tc_vars.list_products.length < 3.0) {
window.tc_vars.list_products.push(tcInfo);
}
window.tc_vars.list_product_id.push(tcInfo.product_id);
window.tc_vars.list_product_name.push(tcInfo.product_name);
window.tc_vars.list_product_discount_tf.push(tcInfo.product_discount_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_originalprice_tf.push(tcInfo.product_originalprice_tf);

window.tc_vars.list_product_breadcrumb_label.push(tcInfo.product_breadcrumb_label);
})();
</script>

(function () {

currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"BOW007918900001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Gothic\u0020Dsquared2\u0020Boots\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dboots\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"1290\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");

impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}

})();

}
};

impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}

})();

ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"ABW018912900001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Gothic\u0020Dsquared2\u0020Heeled\u0020Ankle\u0020Boots\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dboots\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"1290\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"4073\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

		search_params.queryLocale = 'en';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-shoes-boots", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"ABW019710102325\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Denim\u0020Combat\u0020Boots\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dboots\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"845\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"3096\"\u007d");

impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"ABW019001500001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Icon\u0020Clubbing\u0020Combat\u0020Boots\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dboots\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"880\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"ABW016101500001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"D2\u0020Statement\u0020Ankle\u0020Boots\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"new\u002dcollection\u002dwomen\u002dshoes\u002dboots\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"1180\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M802\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>
</section>
</div>

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"SNW033259207159\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Dash\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dsneakers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"5057\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"SNW033259207159\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Dash\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dsneakers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M063\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

var tcInfo = JSON.parse("\u007b\"product\u005fid\"\u003a\"SNW033259207159M536\"\u002c\"product\u005fsku\"\u003anull\u002c\"product\u005fname\"\u003a\"Dash\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"product\u005fvariant\"\u003a\"M536\"\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpage\"\u003a\"https\u003a\/\/www\u002edsquared2\u002ecom\/us\/dash\u002dsneakers\/SNW033259207159M536\u002ehtml\"\u002c\"product\u005fdiscount\u005ftf\"\u003a\"0\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005fcurrentprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005foriginalprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005finstock\"\u003a\"1\"\u002c\"product\u005fbreadcrumb\u005flabel\"\u003a\u005b\"Home\"\u002c\"Women\"\u002c\"Shoes\"\u002c\"Sneakers\"\u002c\"Dash\u0020Sneakers\"\u005d\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpicture\"\u003a\"\/dw\/image\/v2\/BJTL\u005fPRD\/on\/demandware\u002estatic\/\u002d\/Sites\u002ddsquared2\u002dmaster\u002dcatalog\/default\/dw0a788c6e\/images\/SNW033259207159M536S\u002ejpg\u003fsw\u003d476\u0026sh\u003d714\u0026sm\u003dfit\u0026q\u003d65\"\u007d");
if (window.tc_vars.list_products.length < 3.0) {
window.tc_vars.list_products.push(tcInfo);
}
window.tc_vars.list_product_id.push(tcInfo.product_id);
window.tc_vars.list_product_name.push(tcInfo.product_name);
window.tc_vars.list_product_discount_tf.push(tcInfo.product_discount_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_originalprice_tf.push(tcInfo.product_originalprice_tf);
window.tc_vars.list_product_currentprice_tf.push(tcInfo.product_currentprice_tf);

window.tc_vars.list_product_instock.push(tcInfo.product_instock);
window.tc_vars.list_product_breadcrumb_label.push(tcInfo.product_breadcrumb_label);
})();
</script>

currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};

impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}

})();

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"SNW0332592C7159\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Dash\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dsneakers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M2908\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"SNW034211100001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"New\u0020Jersey\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dsneakers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"515\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M2197\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"SNW034211100001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"New\u0020Jersey\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dsneakers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"515\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M063\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>

(function () {

event: 'pageLoad',

currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"SNW025801602625\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"New\u0020Jersey\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dsneakers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"515\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M2859\"\u007d");

impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

(function () {

event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"SNW034710107281\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Spiker\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dsneakers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"515\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M2887\"\u007d");

if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

		search_params.queryLocale = 'en';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-shoes-sneakers", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewProduct-active_data.js) */
dw.ac._capture({id: "SNW031501607269M2864", type: "searchhit"});
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

}
};

}

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"SNW031501606243\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Spiker\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"475\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M2168\"\u007d");

if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

window.tc_vars.list_product_url_page.push(tcInfo.product_url_page);

window.tc_vars.list_product_instock.push(tcInfo.product_instock);
window.tc_vars.list_product_breadcrumb_label.push(tcInfo.product_breadcrumb_label);
})();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"SNW0306117C2809\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Bubble\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dsneakers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"775\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M2777\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>

        Bumper Sneakers
    </a>

	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'SNW0260015025311062',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-shoes-sneakers';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-shoes-sneakers\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'best-matches';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BJTL";
	cq_params.siteId = "dsquared2-row";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "en";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script><script>//<!--

		search_params.persd = 'false';

		search_params.sort = 'best-matches';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';

    if(window.CQuotient) {
	var cq_params = {};
	
	cq_params.cookieId = window.CQuotient.getCQCookieId();
	cq_params.userId = window.CQuotient.getCQUserId();
	cq_params.emailId = CQuotient.getCQHashedEmail();
	cq_params.loginId = CQuotient.getCQHashedLogin();
	cq_params.accumulate = true;
	cq_params.products = [{
	    id: 'SNW0217015057962124',
	    sku: ''
	}];
	cq_params.categoryId = 'women-shoes-sneakers';
	cq_params.refinements = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-shoes-sneakers\"}]';
	cq_params.personalized = 'false';
	cq_params.sortingRule = 'best-matches';
	cq_params.imageUUID = '__UNDEFINED__';
	cq_params.realm = "BJTL";
	cq_params.siteId = "dsquared2-row";
	cq_params.instanceType = "prd";
	cq_params.queryLocale = "en";
	cq_params.locale = window.CQuotient.locale;
	
	if(window.CQuotient.sendActivity)
	    window.CQuotient.sendActivity(CQuotient.clientId, 'viewCategory', cq_params);
	else
	    window.CQuotient.activities.push({
	    	activityType: 'viewCategory',
	    	parameters: cq_params
	    });
  }
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script><script>//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (viewCategoryProduct-active_data.js) */
(function(){
try {
	if (dw.ac) {
		var search_params = {};
		search_params.persd = 'false';
		search_params.refs = '[{\"name\":\"Category\",\"value\":\"women-shoes-sneakers\"}]';
		search_params.sort = 'best-matches';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = '1c312abb-f493-45d0-a7a4-ca9b02a72fa2';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'en';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-shoes-sneakers", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"SNW021701505796\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Original\u0020Legend\u0020Sneakers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dsneakers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"450\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

		search_params.sort = 'best-matches';
		search_params.imageUUID = '';
		search_params.searchID = '96999089-0a56-442e-b6e5-6babe91cf144';
		search_params.locale = 'en_US';
		search_params.queryLocale = 'en';
		search_params.showProducts = 'true';
		dw.ac.applyContext({category: "women-shoes-loafers", searchData: search_params});
		if (typeof dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission === "function") {
			dw.ac._scheduleDataSubmission();
		}
	}
} catch(err) {}
})();
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

/* <![CDATA[ (viewProduct-active_data.js) */
dw.ac._capture({id: "LOW0016015000012124", type: "searchhit"});
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>

Gothic Dsquared2 Loafers
</a>

(function () {

event: 'pageLoad',

currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"LOW001601500001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Gothic\u0020Dsquared2\u0020Loafers\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dloafers\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"845\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");

if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"ESW002410100001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Hola\u0020Lace\u002dUp\u0020Espadrilles\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"460\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"3096\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>
</section>

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"ESW002018905143\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"D2\u0020Statement\u0020Soft\u0020Espadrilles\u0020Slides\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"555\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

(function () {

}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"ESW001918905143\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"D2\u0020Statement\u0020Soft\u0020Espadrilles\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"585\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"8082\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>
</section>

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"FFW002517200001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Canadian\u0020Leaf\u0020Slides\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dslides\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"385\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"9207\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"FFW002517200001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Canadian\u0020Leaf\u0020Slides\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dslides\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"385\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"2124\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"FFW002517200001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Canadian\u0020Leaf\u0020Slides\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dslides\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"385\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"5086\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>
</section>

(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"FFW000117203516\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Be\u0020Icon\u0020Beach\u0020Shoes\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dslides\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"170\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M063\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"FFW001717203516\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Be\u0020Icon\u0020Beach\u0020Shoes\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dslides\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"240\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"9217\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>
</section>

(function () {

event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"FFW001717205013\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"Dsquared2\u0020Logo\u0020Slides\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dslides\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"240\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M591\"\u007d");

if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();

window.tc_vars.list_product_id = window.tc_vars.list_product_id || []
window.tc_vars.list_product_name = window.tc_vars.list_product_name || [];

window.tc_vars.list_product_currentprice_tf = window.tc_vars.list_product_currentprice_tf || [];
window.tc_vars.list_product_url_page = window.tc_vars.list_product_url_page || [];
window.tc_vars.list_product_url_picture = window.tc_vars.list_product_url_picture || [];
window.tc_vars.list_product_instock = window.tc_vars.list_product_instock || [];
window.tc_vars.list_product_breadcrumb_label = window.tc_vars.list_product_breadcrumb_label || [];
var tcInfo = JSON.parse("\u007b\"product\u005fid\"\u003a\"FSW005401500001M802\"\u002c\"product\u005fsku\"\u003anull\u002c\"product\u005fname\"\u003a\"D2\u0020Statement\u0020Sandals\"\u002c\"product\u005fvariant\"\u003a\"M802\"\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpage\"\u003a\"https\u003a\/\/www\u002edsquared2\u002ecom\/us\/d2\u002dstatement\u002dsandals\/FSW005401500001M802\u002ehtml\"\u002c\"product\u005fdiscount\u005ftf\"\u003a\"0\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005fcurrentprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"495\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005foriginalprice\u005ftf\"\u003a\"495\u002e00\"\u002c\"product\u005finstock\"\u003a\"1\"\u002c\"product\u005fbreadcrumb\u005flabel\"\u003a\u005b\"Home\"\u002c\"Women\"\u002c\"Shoes\"\u002c\"Slides\"\u002c\"D2\u0020Statement\u0020Sandals\"\u005d\u002c\"product\u005furl\u005fpicture\"\u003a\"\/dw\/image\/v2\/BJTL\u005fPRD\/on\/demandware\u002estatic\/\u002d\/Sites\u002ddsquared2\u002dmaster\u002dcatalog\/default\/dw5a956afe\/images\/FSW005401500001M802B\u002ejpg\u003fsw\u003d476\u0026sh\u003d714\u0026sm\u003dfit\u0026q\u003d65\"\u007d");
if (window.tc_vars.list_products.length < 3.0) {
window.tc_vars.list_products.push(tcInfo);
}
window.tc_vars.list_product_id.push(tcInfo.product_id);
window.tc_vars.list_product_name.push(tcInfo.product_name);
window.tc_vars.list_product_discount_tf.push(tcInfo.product_discount_tf);

window.tc_vars.list_product_currentprice_tf.push(tcInfo.product_currentprice_tf);

})();

<script type="text/javascript">
(function () {
var gtmImpressions = window.gtmImpressions || {
event: 'pageLoad',
ecommerce: {
currencyCode: 'USD',
impressions: []
}
};
var impressionData = JSON.parse("\u007b\"list\"\u003a\"Products\u0020Listings\"\u002c\"id\"\u003a\"FSW005401500001\"\u002c\"name\"\u003a\"D2\u0020Statement\u0020Sandals\"\u002c\"category\"\u003a\"women\u002dshoes\u002dslides\"\u002c\"brand\"\u003a\"D2\"\u002c\"price\"\u003a\"495\u002e00\"\u002c\"variant\"\u003a\"M802\"\u007d");
impressionData.position = gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.length + 1;
if ((window.location.search.indexOf('q=') > -1) && (impressionData.list !== 'Products Carousel')) {
impressionData.list = 'Search Results';
}
gtmImpressions.ecommerce.impressions.push(impressionData);
window.gtmImpressions = gtmImpressions;
})();
</script>

<script>
    zE('webWidget:on', 'chat:departmentStatus', function (dept) {
        if (dept.name === 'DSQUARED2 chat EST' && dept.status === 'online') {
            zE('webWidget', 'updateSettings', {
                webWidget: {
                    chat: {
                        departments: { enabled: [''], select: 'DSQUARED2 chat EST' },
                        suppress: false,
                    },
                },
            });
        } else if (dept.name === 'DSQUARED2 chat EST' && dept.status !== 'online') {
            zE('webWidget', 'updateSettings', {
                webWidget: {
                    chat: { suppress: true },
                },
            });
        }
    });
</script>

                        >
                            {{text}}
                        </button>

                </div>
            {{/showActions}}
        </div>

            </div>

    </script>
